OOC Lunarpine was smelling the Maximals at the time, something breaks out he
needs to know where NOT to shoot.

BIC Lunarpine smells to many scents in the area to be comfortable with.There
was still a chance that Prebon might just be covering his own back but odds
weren't favoring that possability.

 He lets Ramulus do the talking, knowing full well he can pull thier
tailplates out of the inferno if necessary.

The battle begins, Lunarpine steps close to Ramulus, with all the gunfire he
gets seperated, he catches a familiar scent, "Striker" he thinks as the
battle rages.

He works his way to where the battle between Striker and Ramulus rages,
Ramulus was holding his own but there was no way he could last against a
natural Predator like Striker.

It was time to see what his new form was capable of. "Back off Striker and I
won't fight you." he knew that wolves of the same pack didn't fight amongst
themselves. It seemed that Striker had gone Rabid and there was only one
answer to a rabid animal.>
>
>
>
>
